Cherrycake\Modules\CacheProviderApc::touch

touch

Stablishes a new expiration TTL for an element in the APC cache. Since APC doesn't provides a touch method itself, a workaround is done, which is probably slow.

    Signature

    public function touch(string $key, integer $ttl )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The identifier key for the object to be touched
    $ttl — integer
    The new TTL (Time To Live) for the stored value in seconds

    Defined by Interface

    CacheProviderInterface
